name: allocate_skill_points
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーにスキルポイントを割り当てるが、"]
# [doc = " skill_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックを行っていない"]
body: let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . skill_account ;
acct . strength = acct . strength . checked_add (strength as u64) . unwrap () ;
acct . agility = acct . agility . checked_add (agility as u64) . unwrap () ;
acct . intelligence = acct . intelligence . checked_add (intelligence as u64) . unwrap () ;
acct . points_allocated = acct . points_allocated . checked_add (strength as u64 + agility as u64 + intelligence as u64) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: skill_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " スキル割り当てを行うユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このスキルアカウントを所有すべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: points_allocated
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 割り当て済みスキルポイントの総数"]
